body: Well, I made 2 AMAs a while ago and not much was put on there. So here's another one. Please ask away...?
body_tagged: Well, I made 2 AMAs a while ago and not much was put on there. So here's another one. Please ask away...?
title: This is an AMA... Apparently.

replies.body: What makes you feel like beating players and laughing?
replies.body_tagged: What makes you feel like beating players and laughing?

replies.body:
-.-
My mouse wouldn't work, and I did not mean it in that context.
Disclaimer- Oscar does not beat players and laugh.

replies.body:
I did ban Snow once. When I first got full mod, Pel told me to ban another moderator online. The ban message read something like:
OscarElNana banned SnowSX3 for Being a Womat.

replies.body:
Do you like stabbing people 37 times and then eating their hands? :P

Serious question: On Avicus, what do you think is an approximate ratio of your friends to enemies?
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
I memorised the Llamas With Hats Films to the point where it was just sad xD


Serious answer: There are only a couple of people who I mildly dislike on Avicus, so probably around 80:1.

replies.body:
The nearest food (Unless it's olives)
Decay holds a special place in my heart, but maybe Senex III
How many waffles could a waffle oven oven if a waffle oven could oven waffle ovens?
Mojito or iced tea
The everything
Britain
America Unchained -Dave Gorman
What?! Maybe a Skorpiovenator?
Blue, Purple, Black and White.
Music
Football, badminton or Jumpy Death Sticks
http://riddlydiddly.com/
lukeisnotsexy, Filthy Frank, TheGamingLemon, Emma Blackery and Marcus Dibble.
Item? In Minecraft? Probably the Diamond Shovel.
If you can include Llamas with Hats, then that.
All of 'em.
Autumn
Don't watch anime and have no intention to.
Go to Avicus Quotes xD
Dubstep, Brostep, Metalstep, Chill or Prog-Rock.
Monorails.
Not these.

I shall
